source(output(
		{ÑÑD�A�Y�_�I�D�} as string,
		�r�c�_�n�a�m�e� as string,

	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true,
	format: 'delimited',

	folderPath: 'bc6f661b-7bde-4694-b632-9c01e374d33c',

	format: 'parquet') ~> sink1
